name: DeleteProjectEnvVariables
description:
Delete multiple environment variables from a Vercel project.

Use this tool to delete several environment variables for a specific Vercel project at once. It's useful when managing project configurations and needing to remove obsolete or sensitive data efficiently.

parameters.name: project_id_or_name
parameters.description: The unique project identifier or the project name to specify which project to delete variables from.

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of when deleting environment variables.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug representing the team on whose behalf the request is performed.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: env_variable_ids
parameters.description: Array of environment variable IDs to delete.

ids.description: Array of environment variable IDs to delete

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: idOrName
parameters.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

ids.description: Array of environment variable IDs to delete
